title: Schema
description: Creates a new generic class definition in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new shape element.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the shape element?

shapeType.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the shape type?

path.description: The path at which to create the class, relative to the workspace root.

spec.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new class.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

schematicsDataFile.description: Path where schematics-data file is located.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the class.
